channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2475] Jon Stewart Sums Up Everything That is Wrong with America
item.description: Yesterday, the new Credit Card Accountability Responsibility and Disclosure act went into effect--but not without controversy. And tonight on The Daily Show, Jon Stewart brilliantly laid out both what's wrong with American consumers and with credit card companies.

item.title: [+2154] A new way to sit [PIC]
[+2089] Conan O'Brien is now on Twitter!
item.description: I had a show. Then I had a different show. Now I have a Twitter account.

item.title: [+1969] What Happens After I Die?
item.description: A graphical representation of what happens after Death.

item.title: [+1411] Troops Storming the Taliban Stronghold of Marjah [PICS]
item.description: Dramatic photos taken as thousands of U.S. Marines and Afghan soldiers stormed the Taliban stronghold of Marjah, sweeping by air and ground against scattered resistance into the biggest southern town under militant control. The massive offensive was aimed at breaking the Taliban grip over a wide area of their southern heartland.

item.title: [+1166] Modern Life (PIC)
[+1141] Mother wants apology over Pledge of Allegiance
item.description: The mother of a 13-year-old Montgomery County middle school student is demanding an apology from a teacher who had school police escort the youngster from a classroom for refusing to say the Pledge of Allegiance.

item.title: [+1134] Astonishing Illusion Cave in the Middle of London
item.description: Imagine that you are walking down the street in urban area and suddenly there is a huge cave in front of your feet in the middle of your way.

item.title: [+1105] Scientists Have Discovered A "Slut Gene" WTF?
item.description: Scientists have discovered a genetic trait which may cause young women to be sluts. While studying the DNA of college students, researchers found that women with a greater variation of the genes that influence the immune system also had more sexual partners.

item.title: [+992] U.S. Dept of Zombie Removal (Pic)
item.description: This could explain where all the stimulus money went.

item.title: [+883] Smokers have lower IQs than non-smokers
item.description: Cigarette smokers have lower IQs than non-smokers, and the more a person smokes, the lower their IQ, a study in over 20,000 Israeli military recruits suggests. The smokers had significantly lower intelligence test scores than non-smokers, and this remained true even after the researchers accounted for socioeconomic status.

item.title: [+861] Latest Sarah Palin Speech Opens Sixth Seal
item.description: IDAHO FALLS, ID: Admittedly, this is not what we were expecting, said a University of Cambridge doctor of divinity. The Bible speaks of a beast with seven horns and seven eyes, not a raven-haired woman from the north who knows not what foolishness she speaks of.

item.title: [+773] How You Can Live To 100 (Graphic)
item.description: Look at factors which can influence an increase your expected lifespan, so maybe you too can reach that grand age of 100.

item.title: [+768] A Curvy Woman's Body is Like a Drug for Men
item.description: Brain scans of the men revealed that seeing post-surgery women activated parts of the brain linked with rewards, including regions associated with responses to drugs and alcohol.

item.title: [+701] Team Canada eliminates Russia in Quarterfinal play
item.description: Canada will play for a medal in the men's Olympic hockey tournament with a dominant 7-3 victory over arch-rival Russia in their quarterfinal encounter.

item.title: [+660] Voltron Girl [PIC]
[+637] New Super Mario Galaxy 2 Trailer is Incredible
item.description: It has been hard not to view the game as anything but a quick cash-in. Needless to say, after it was annoucned today at the Nintendo Summit that the game will be released May 23rd, I became even more worried. That was until I saw the game's newest trailer.

item.title: [+616] ChatRoulette: "Nexting" by the Numbers [Infographic]
item.description: Ladies really do have all the luck, and the perverts are a sizable minority

item.title: [+608] Blackwater used South Park character to procure AK-47s
item.description: It yet another example of the extreme nature of the US military's most controversial contractor, a Senate report has found that the company used the alias "Eric Cartman" to score 200 AK-47s while in Afghanistan. Blackwater has since changed its name to "Xe Services."

item.title: [+607] Reactor Burns Depleted Fuel Emerges as Potential Game Change
item.description: Potential 'Game Changer' , This reactor works something like a cigarette. A chain reaction is launched in one end of a closed cylinder of spent uranium fuel, creating a slow-moving "deflagration," a wave of nuclear fission reactions that keeps breeding neutrons as it makes way through the container, keeping the self-sustaining reaction going
